scripts.browserify: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ env react ] --plugins [ transform-object-rest-spread transform-decorators-legacy ] ] -t [ browserify-css --global ] src/*.js -o '| tee ../firefox/app/js/build/app.js ../chrome/app/js/build/app.js > /dev/null'
scripts.watch: watchify -t [ babelify --presets [ env react ] --plugins [ transform-object-rest-spread transform-decorators-legacy ] ]  -t [ browserify-css --global ] src/*.js -o '| tee ../firefox/app/js/build/app.js ../chrome/app/js/build/app.js > /dev/null'
